items.flavorText: “The star may be dying, but I'm not takin' YOUR heat today!”  — Reyna Valeria

items.name: “Alamo-7” Armor
items.flavorText: “Enabling famous last stands since C.R. 19852!”

items.name: Symbiotic Spores
items.flavorText:
“We are one!” — Miko
“Gross. You're gross.” — Oscar Mike

items.name: Solar Sustainer
items.flavorText: The Jennerit Silent Sisters employ numerous solar-powered devices to aid in battle.

items.name: Void Resonator
items.flavorText: “Just because it's a demon door to hell doesn't mean it can't be helpful.”  — Gunnar Kleese

items.name: Dr. Fist's Medic Bag
items.flavorText: “PSH, WHAT ARE YOU CRYING ABOUT, IT'S ONLY YOUR GUTS!”  — Dr. Fist

items.name: Vidania Root Poultice
items.flavorText: “NOT poison if applied carefully!”  — Boldur's Guide to Ekkuni Herbs

items.name: Leechsteel Brooch
items.flavorText: Made from a Jennerit alloy capable of absorbing various energy signatures, including body heat.

items.name: Arcship Buoy
items.flavorText: Autonomous mechanized marker capable of providing healing and air for emergencies.

items.name: All-4-One™ Morale Booster
items.flavorText: “Hey, you're doing great! Keep fighting!”  — stock encouragement from the All-4-One™

items.name: Song of Vigor
items.flavorText: “Ma'rahei cho malar farhal mesart'ya.”  — Ancient Aelfrin saying

items.name: Oath of the Sustained
items.flavorText: “I am forever Jennerit. I am for all Jennerit. I am first among Jennerit.”

items.name: Medical Nano-Colony
items.flavorText: “Look, they even built tiny little ambulances!”  — Gunnar Kleese

items.name: Emergency Auto-Medic
items.flavorText: “Greetings! You have been wounded. Please select your injury from the following list...”

items.name: Vigilance Link
items.flavorText: Elite Eldrid warriors known as the Vigilant are known to attune their minds for battle.

items.name: Vampiric Vestment
items.flavorText: “Next time someone asks, I'm just going to say, 'Yes, I'm a vampire. Bleh!'”  — Verod Rath

items.name: Premium Health Plan
items.flavorText: “Affordable health care?! Ahahahaha!”  — Marquis d'Caliber

items.name: Pain-2-Gain™ Re-Knitter
items.flavorText: Instantly repairs torn tissue, with only minimal grotesque scarring.

items.name: Voxis Core
items.flavorText: The lost Jennerit colony of Voxis was known for unique energy projection tech.

items.name: Executive Insurance Policy
items.flavorText: Comes standard with ascension to any LLC Guild Council position.

items.name: The Modernista
items.flavorText: “Right back at 'cha.”

items.name: One-4-All™ Shield Array
items.flavorText: “Deploy as a team; survive as a team!”  — One-4-All™ advertisement slogan

items.name: Mossire's Mukluks
items.flavorText: “I have given my speed and aid to the last great cause.”  — Eldrid Elder Mossire

items.name: Boots of the Brute
items.flavorText: “I will catch you. Then, I will destroy you.”  — Foreman Grall

items.name: Trail Blazers
items.flavorText: “Fast. Punchy. And best of all, orange!”  — Orendi

items.name: RDC Ground-Pounders
items.flavorText: “Footwear for finding, fixing, flanking, and finishing.”

items.name: Mini-Singularity Launcher

items.name: Starkweather's Oscillator
items.flavorText: “Converted, transduced, transmogrified... whatever. Just SHOOT!”  — Gunnar Kleese

items.name: Anti-Motion Brace
items.flavorText: “Newton's Third Law need not apply.”

items.flavorText: Green tendrils of hard organic substances intertwine Mellka's UPR pistol magazines.

items.name: UPR Synchronograph
items.flavorText: Engraved with: “Property of T. Ghalt. DO NOT TOUCH!”

items.name: The Double Hug
items.flavorText: Brought to you on behalf of Toby and Berg's infamous “Friendship Raids”.

items.name: Harresburra Adrenal Serum
items.flavorText: “Its 'fight-or-flight' response is activated at birth and persists until up to twelve hours after death.”

items.name: “Air Mail” AGM Loader
items.flavorText: “YOU get a rocket, and YOU get a rocket... EVERYONE gets a rocket!”  — Benedict

items.name: Captain's Snazzy Timepiece
items.flavorText: “I am in charge. And I make it look GOOD.”  — Reyna

items.name: Galahadric Gun Grease
items.flavorText: The closely-kept secret of a lost civilization, this firearm lubricant is one-of-a-kind.

items.name: Dramatic Rescue
items.flavorText: “If you save them too quick, there's no time for the villain's monologue!”  — Kid Ultra

items.name: Hedronic Amplifier
items.flavorText: “Do NOT flee from my fancy speeches!”  — Attikus

items.name: Defensive Reasoner
items.flavorText: Modified LLC shield charger permanently linked to ISIC's global ID number.

items.name: Shard of Jennar
items.flavorText: Cherished remnant of the darkened Jennerit throneworld.

items.name: Energetic Refractor
items.flavorText: “I am quite almost positive that this will not harm you. Possibly.”  — Kleese

items.name: Spores of Mikollopria
items.flavorText: In each dagger thrown by Miko is a spore of its home, the great planet Mikollopria.

items.name: Emulan Tincture
items.flavorText: A rare restorative concoction brewed with water from Alani's now-darkened homeworld.
